name: Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients: 8 oz. cream cheese, room temperature (for a thinner frosting)
steps: ½ cup unsalted butter, room temperature 1 lb. powdered sugar (for a stiffer frosting) OR 2 cups
(If you want to drizzle the frosting on the top, rather than cover the cake, use only 2 cups of powdered sugar and
heat it up in the microwave first for about 15-­‐30 seconds, or until it drizzles easily.)
